column4: I installed linuxmint desktop , gnome-shell but removed them all
to some extent the disc is a tool yes, but a in place repair like windows is not there.
can't I reinstall ubuntu and keep my ubuntu documents etc ?
did you make a separate home partition?
well its a default ubuntu install beside windows 7
it ios a dual boot not a wubi install from W7?
i choose on start up screen windows or ubuntu
you can use the ubuntu live cd to save your docs etc, then reinstall if needed.
okay so I will have that option when running the live cd?
yes, but not a gui just your skills to open that partition from home and save your stuf.
you might be able to fix any problems if you can share them with us as well.

they're too many, gedit for an example the first time i start it it will open then terminate the second time it works, I no longer see Connect to server menu when im on desktop, the dual boot screen changed its look, I still see kde ,kfce, mint when logging in
it can get a bit messy if you install all those desktops, probably faster to back up then fix your choice realy.
